<style xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
    class="in-text"
    xml:lang="en"
    version="1.0">
  <info>
    <id></id>
    <title></title>
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>

    <citation>
        <layout>
            <names variable="author">
                <name delimiter="; ">
                    <name-part name="family"/>
                </name>
            </names>
        </layout>
    </citation>
</style>
